attributes.name: CCP Network Device Exploitation TTPs

cases.name: SSH Backdoor Activation
cases.query: source:cisco OR source:paloalto OR source:linux OR source:firewall ("service sshd_operns start" OR network.destination.port:57722 OR network.destination.port:/^\d{3,5}22$/)

cases.name: Suspicious ACL Modifications
cases.query: source:cisco OR source:paloalto OR source:linux OR source:firewall ("access-list 10" OR "access-list 20" OR "access-list 50")

cases.name: Unauthorized User Creation
cases.query: source:cisco OR source:paloalto OR source:linux OR source:firewall ("useradd cisco" OR "vi /etc/sudoers")

cases.name: Packet Capture Activity
cases.query: source:cisco OR source:paloalto OR source:linux OR source:firewall ("monitor capture" OR "span" OR "erspan" OR "mycap.pcap" OR "tac.pcap" OR "1.pcap")

attributes.message: CCP Network Device Exploitation TTPs: {distinct_count} distinct techniques on host {host} by user {user}. Techniques: {case_names}. Details: {message OR network.destination.ip OR network.destination.port}. Timeframe: {first_activity} to {last_activity}
